2fa.description: Two factor authentication (2FA) adds another layer of security to your account. When enabled, you are required to login both with your password and a one-time verification code from your mobile or desktop app.

save_2fa.error: Impossible to save Two Factor Authentication Profile: {{error}}

step_select.name: Select
step_select.title: How would you like to receive your authentication codes?
step_select.subtitle: You will be asked for an authentication code when you sign in to your account.

mail.title: Email
mail.subtitle: Receive an email in your inbox when sign in.

sms.title: SMS Text Message
sms.subtitle: Receive a text message to your mobile device when sign in.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Text Message
whatsapp.subtitle: Receive a WhatsApp message to your mobile device when sign in.

mail.title: Email
mail.subtitle:
Please enter your email address, then click the button "Next".
You will receive a security code in your inbox. On the next step you must confirm this code.

sms.title: SMS Text Message
sms.subtitle:
Please enter your mobile phone number, then click the button "Next".
You will receive a security code on your phone via SMS. On the next step you must confirm this code.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Text Message
whatsapp.subtitle:
Please enter your mobile phone number (Linked to WhatsApp), then click the button "Next".
You will receive a security code on your phone via WhatsApp. On the next step you must confirm this code.

mail.title: Verify your Email
mail.subtitle: You'll need to confirm that you still have access to this email before change authentication method. Please check your email inbox for incoming mail and enter the security code below:

sms.title: Verify your phone number
sms.subtitle: You'll need to confirm that you still have access to this phone number before change authentication method. Please check your mobile phone for incoming SMS and enter the security code below:

whatsapp.title: Verify your WhatsApp
whatsapp.subtitle: You'll need to confirm that you still have access to this phone number before change authentication method. Please check your mobile phone for incoming WhatsApp and enter the security code below:

mail.title: Successfully
mail.subtitle: You have successfully confirmed your email.

step1.title: 1. You will enter your password
step1.subtitle: Whenever you sign in, you will enter your password as usual.

step2.title: 2. You will ask for a security code
step2.subtitle: Then enter the security code from your email inbox

sms.title: Successfully
sms.subtitle: You have successfully confirmed your mobile phone number.

step1.title: 1. You will enter your password
step1.subtitle: Whenever you sign in, you will enter your password as usual.

step2.title: 2. You will ask for a security code
step2.subtitle: Then enter the security code from your SMS.

whatsapp.title: Successfully
whatsapp.subtitle: You have successfully confirmed your WhatsApp phone number.

step1.title: 1. You will enter your password
step1.subtitle: Whenever you sign in, you will enter your password as usual.

step2.title: 2. You will ask for a security code
step2.subtitle: Then enter the security code from your WhatsApp.
